Title: Consider moving the `MetadataFacet::uri` disclaimer from metadata attributes to the description
Content:
The [disclaimer](https://github.com/BeanstalkFarms/Beanstalk/blob/12c608a22535e3a1fe379db1153185fe43851ea7/protocol/contracts/beanstalk/metadata/MetadataFacet.sol#L46) within `MetadataFacet::uri` currently resides at the end of the JSON attributes; however, this may be better placed within the metadata description instead.

**Beanstalk Farms:** The disclaimer placement was largely inspired by [Uniswap V3â€™s NFT](https://opensea.io/assets/ethereum/0xc36442b4a4522e871399cd717abdd847ab11fe88/528320) and thus, feel that the attribute section is an adequate place to keep it.

**Cyfrin:** Acknowledged.
